rukus.text: wa-ittakhadha qawmu musa min baʿdihi min huliyyihim ʿij'lan jasadan lahu khuwarun alam yaraw annahu la yukallimuhum wala yahdihim sabilan ittakhadhuhu wakanu zalimina
walamma suqita fi aydihim wara-aw annahum qad dallu qalu la-in lam yarhamna rabbuna wayaghfir lana lanakunanna mina l-khasirina

walamma rajaʿa musa ila qawmihi ghadbana asifan qala bi'sama khalaftumuni min baʿdi aʿajil'tum amra rabbikum wa-alqa l-alwaha wa-akhadha birasi akhihi yajurruhu ilayhi qala ib'na umma inna l-qawma is'tadʿafuni wakadu yaqtulunani fala tush'mit biya l-aʿdaa wala tajʿalni maʿa l-qawmi l-zalimina
qala rabbi igh'fir li wali-akhi wa-adkhil'na fi rahmatika wa-anta arhamu l-rahimina
